name: Dungeon game part 2.
description:
This is the second part of my dungeon game. This is going to be the adventure part of the game. I want to get an idea of what people think to the design of my game. You can go into the different houses and I have started working on dialogue so if you see a button in the corner of the screen that says continue just click that until it disappears. 

Feel free to explore and let me know what you think to what I have so far.  I have started to put the traps into my game and I have 2 more left to do. I will then work on the rest of the towns for my game as well.

You use the arrow keys to move and once you have had a play leave as you normally would. I look forward to seeing any comments and suggestions for this. I will keep working on this so make sure you keep checking back to see what has changed. Thank you.
